content.en: Battery SOH estimation: Researchers have been exploring various methods to accurately estimate the State-of-Health (SOH) of lithium-ion batteries. These methods often rely on machine learning algorithms to extract significant features from battery discharge curves or other battery parameters. For example, one proposed method uses the Least Squares Support Vector Machine algorithm, while another combines feature extraction, manipulation, and a multivariate Gaussian distribution theory for SOH estimation. These advancements in algorithmic techniques aim to improve the accuracy of predicting the health and performance of lithium-ion batteries.
content.da: SOH-estimering af batteri: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige metoder til nøjagtigt at estimere lithium-ion batteriers State-of-Health (SOH). Disse metoder afhænger ofte af maskinlæringsalgoritmer til at udvinde væsentlige træk fra batteri-afladningskurver eller andre batteriparametre. For eksempel bruger en foreslået metode Least Squares Support Vector Machine algoritmen, mens en anden kombinerer trækudvinding, manipulation og en multivariat gaussisk fordelingsteori til SOH-estimering. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmeteknikker har til formål at forbedre nøjagtigheden af forudsigelse af sundhed og ydeevne for lithium-ion batterier.
